lines.text: If we... assume the reason we couldn't find any <c=#FF6000>Reversing Rune</c> stickers is that they disposed of them...
And that maybe they disposed of them in the tub, where the concrete would trap them...
Then maybe... the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> went to stuff them in the tub, but accidentally fell in?
Even if that were an accident, it probably wouldn't be tough to break free of the stuff.
What, not tough to break out of a solid rock shell?
Solid rock is a very different thing from quick-dry concrete, kid.
Huh. You learn something every day.
